document.title: Hot Topic: Tennessee Building and Fire Codes
document.abstract: The proposed rules provide for the adoption of the 2002 International Building Code and the 2003 NFPA Uniform Fire Code.

field.name: comments

The content contained in these publications may be outdated, and the laws referenced therein may have changed or may not be applicable to your city or circumstances.
